M10Robot:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
M10Robot:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Extract !M! cards. NL m10robot:Overclock the next !M! cards you play !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:AllIn.NAME: All In
M10Robot:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand X{!M!|>0= + !M!} times.

M10Robot:Ascension.NAME: Ascension
M10Robot:Ascension.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand !M10Robot:SecondMagic! time{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:AssaultField.NAME: Assault Field
M10Robot:AssaultField.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle !M! *Assault{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile.

M10Robot:Assault.NAME: Assault
M10Robot:Assault.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:AssemblyLine.NAME: Assembly Line
M10Robot:AssemblyLine.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Channel !M! m10robot:Presents. NL m10robot:Upgrade all your Orbs !M10Robot:SecondMagic! time{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:AttackDown.NAME: Attack Down
M10Robot:AttackDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:DefenseDown.NAME: Defense Down
M10Robot:DefenseDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:AutoCaster.NAME: Auto Caster
M10Robot:AutoCaster.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, Evoke your next Orb !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.NAME: Balance Currents
M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! Block.

M10Robot:BitMask.NAME: Bitmask
M10Robot:BitMask.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bit{!M!|>1=s} for each Attack played this turn.{!Location!|0= NL (Attacks played: !M10Robot:Info!)}

M10Robot:BoosterShot.NAME: Booster Shot
M10Robot:BoosterShot.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Aimed. NL Deal !D! damage. NL m10robot:Upgrade all your Orbs !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:Bramble.NAME: Bramble
M10Robot:Bramble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes. NL Gain Block equal to your m10robot:Spikes.{!Location!|0= NL (Gains !B! Block.)}

M10Robot:Byte.NAME: Byte
M10Robot:Byte.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bit{!M!|>1=s}. NL {!M10Robot:Info!|@=Shuffle|>0=Add} !M10Robot:SecondMagic! *Nibbles into your {!M10Robot:Info!|@=draw pile|>0=hand}.

M10Robot:Nibble.NAME: Nibble
M10Robot:Nibble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL All m10robot:Bits will attack this target !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:Cloaking.NAME: Cloaking
M10Robot:Cloaking.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

M10Robot:Compensator.NAME: Compensator
M10Robot:Compensator.DESCRIPTION: REWORK! NL At the end of your turn, reduce m10robot:Recoil by !M!.

M10Robot:CompileData.NAME: Compile Data
M10Robot:CompileData.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Channel !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Present{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}. NL m10robot:Upgrade {!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|@=it|>1=them} !M! time{!M!|>1=s}. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

M10Robot:Concentration.NAME: Deadlock
M10Robot:Concentration.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Scrambled. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:Disable.NAME: Disable
M10Robot:Disable.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Apply !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Weak{!M10Robot:Info!|>0=. NL Apply !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Vulnerable}.

M10Robot:DividedAttention.NAME: Divided Attention
M10Robot:DividedAttention.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}{!M10Robot:Info!|<1= at random}. NL m10robot:Extract !M! card{!M!|-1,>1=s} at random.

M10Robot:DoubleCaster.NAME: Double Caster
M10Robot:DoubleCaster.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first {!M!|@=Orb|>1=!M! Orbs} you Evoke each turn {!M!|@=is|>1=are} Evoked twice.

M10Robot:EMP.NAME: EMP
M10Robot:EMP.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:EnergyShield.NAME: Energy Shield
M10Robot:EnergyShield.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL If you had no Block, gain {!M!|1=[E]|-1,2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|4=[E] [E] [E] [E]|5=[E] [E] [E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

M10Robot:Engage.NAME: Engage
M10Robot:Engage.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! Vulnerable and Lock-On. NL {!M10Robot:Info!|@=If the enemy intends to attack, draw|>0=Draw} !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:EvasionDown.NAME: Evasion Down
M10Robot:EvasionDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Enemy takes !M! additional damage from all sources this turn.

M10Robot:HealthDown.NAME: Health Down
M10Robot:HealthDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Enemy loses !M! HP. NL If you have played *Evasion *Down this turn, repeat this effect.

M10Robot:FeedForward.NAME: Feed Forward
M10Robot:FeedForward.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increases by !M! this combat for each subsequent card played this turn.

M10Robot:Filter.NAME: Filter
M10Robot:Filter.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Swap your draw and discard piles. NL m10robot:Extract !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:FullAuto.NAME: Inversion Beam
M10Robot:FullAuto.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Targets lose Strength this turn equal to unblocked damage taken.

M10Robot:HomeSweeper.NAME: Home Sweeper
M10Robot:HomeSweeper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! more damage per turn passed.

M10Robot:Juggling.NAME: Juggling
M10Robot:Juggling.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! additional card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:LightShow.NAME: Light Show
M10Robot:LightShow.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Channel !M! m10robot:Searchlight{!M!|>1=s} for each Skill played this turn.{!Location!|0= NL (Skills played: !M10Robot:Info!)}

M10Robot:Overdrive.NAME: Overdrive Form
M10Robot:Overdrive.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL At the start of your turn, m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:PileDriver.NAME: Pile Driver
M10Robot:PileDriver.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Spiky. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to a random other enemy.

M10Robot:PowerSavings.NAME: Power Savings
M10Robot:PowerSavings.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Weak. NL At the start of your turn, gain {!M!|-1,1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|4=[E] [E] [E] [E]|5=[E] [E] [E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

M10Robot:Prelude.NAME: Prelude
M10Robot:Prelude.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Overclock the next {!M!|@=card|>1=!M! cards} you play !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
M10Robot:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Attacks drawn this way cost 0 this turn.

M10Robot:QuickRepair.NAME: Quick Repair
M10Robot:QuickRepair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When m10robot:Extracted, NL gain !B! Block.

M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.NAME: RAM Upgrade
M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you Channel an Orb, m10robot:Upgrade it !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:RapidAssembly.NAME: Rapid Assembly
M10Robot:RapidAssembly.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand !M! times.

M10Robot:RecoveryMode.NAME: Recovery Mode
M10Robot:RecoveryMode.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.NAME: Reflective Shell
M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:ReturningShield.NAME: Returning Shield
M10Robot:ReturningShield.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block{!M!|@=.|>0= and draw !M! additional }{!M!|1=card.|>1=cards.}

M10Robot:Rewind.NAME: Rewind
M10Robot:Rewind.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first {!M!|@=time|>1=!M! times} you lose Block each turn, gain that much Block next turn.

M10Robot:RoboBeam.NAME: Robo Beam
M10Robot:RoboBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for every turn passed this combat.

M10Robot:Rumble.NAME: Rumble
M10Robot:Rumble.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! temporary Strength.

M10Robot:Rushdown.NAME: Rush Down
M10Robot:Rushdown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Spiky. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:Salvo.NAME: Command
M10Robot:Salvo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb. NL If the enemy has Lock-On, m10robot:Upgrade all your Orbs !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:ScrapeOff.NAME: Scrape Off
M10Robot:ScrapeOff.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Spiky. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

M10Robot:Scrapper.NAME: Scrapper
M10Robot:Scrapper.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb. NL Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes if this Evoked an Orb.

M10Robot:SecretRootkit.NAME: Rootkit
M10Robot:SecretRootkit.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Cards drawn this way cost 0 this turn.

M10Robot:Seeker.NAME: Seeker
M10Robot:Seeker.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Lock-On. NL If the enemy had Lock-On, draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:SelfDestruction.NAME: Self Destruction
M10Robot:SelfDestruction.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Inert. NL Take !M10Robot:SecondMagic! damage. NL Deal !D! damage. NL m10robot:Stun the enemy.

M10Robot:SlotConversion.NAME: Slot Conversion
M10Robot:SlotConversion.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Gain !M! Orb slots.

M10Robot:SpectralCannon.NAME: Spectral Cannon
M10Robot:SpectralCannon.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:SpikeBall.NAME: Spike Shell
M10Robot:SpikeBall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes. NL m10robot:Recoil.

M10Robot:SpikyPlating.NAME: Spiky Plating
M10Robot:SpikyPlating.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! m10robot:Spikes.

M10Robot:SplitBeam.NAME: Split Beam
M10Robot:SplitBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL When m10robot:Extracted, increase this card's hits by !M10Robot:SecondMagic! this combat.

M10Robot:ThermalImaging.NAME: Thermal Imaging
M10Robot:ThermalImaging.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Lock-On. NL Increase the damage of *Heat *Seekers by !M10Robot:SecondMagic!.

M10Robot:HeatSeekers.NAME: Heat Seekers
M10Robot:HeatSeekers.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:ThornField.NAME: Thorn Field
M10Robot:ThornField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes for each enemy in combat.

M10Robot:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
M10Robot:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL m10robot:Upgrade the next Orb you Channel !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:UnstableCompound.NAME: Unstable Compound
M10Robot:UnstableCompound.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Channel !M! m10robot:Bomb{!M!|>1=s}. NL m10robot:Upgrade a random Orb !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:WaveGenerator.NAME: Wave Generator
M10Robot:WaveGenerator.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Increase the Block of *Wave *Analyzer by !M!.

M10Robot:WaveAnalyzer.NAME: Wave Analyzer
M10Robot:WaveAnalyzer.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Swappable. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the damage of *Wave *Generator by !M!.

M10Robot:WeaponPolish.NAME: Weapon Polish
M10Robot:WeaponPolish.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Playing an attack boosts its damage by !M! this combat.

M10Robot:WideAngle.NAME: Wide Angle
M10Robot:WideAngle.DESCRIPTION: {@@}When you play an Attack, m10robot:Bits now hit !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}. NL Channel !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Bits.

M10Robot:WindUp.NAME: Wind Up
M10Robot:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of ALL *Wind *Up cards by !M! this combat.
